context: Do they ship the correct version based on ur region? Eg PAL to NZ and Europe, Or do they only ship American NTSC version?

response: Yes,but you'll have more options and races when playing online.

context: does this controller use sync to change mode or is there a separate button thanks
response: No, just the sync button to switch, so there is so extra button. You just hit the sync button to move up one mod and you can hold the right trigger and hit the sync button to return to the previous mod.

context: Is the included controller wired or wireless?
response: The one I just purchased a month ago was wired.

context: Amazon states that the DLC is "included".  Is all of the content on a disc, or is it one of those vouchers?
response: The DLCs are on a card with their codes to redeem and download the content.

context: does it charge one controller at a time even if you dock both at the same time, and automatically charge the second after the first?
response: it charges both at the same time:) and it will stop charging one once it's full.

context: is the key clicky or silent
response: Silent,  KB is very nice. Very Comfy wrist fit.   This KB was well worth its price in gold!

context: what difficulty mode is best to play on?
response: I played pro for the most part cause i had not played an NBA 2K game in a long time. But i would be aiming for All-Star or even Superstar with 10 minute quarters as i hear that it gets you closer to real life scores.

context: Can the ds lite play any ds game (excluding ones for later models)?
response: Yes but not ds2 or later games

context: Jeez, what EXACTLY does the red button on top do? Can IT be reprogrammed?
response: It is a fire button and can be reprogrammed.

response: Controller powered. Read the description on the manufacturer website for all details.

response: You can go ahead and buy #3 as 1 and 2 are not that good.

context: can you play it without wifi?
response: Yeah, Wifi is internet, and you can play it without an Internet connection. But you won't be able to download updates, and play online.

context: Does the console play DVD's?
response: No, it does not play DVD or Blu-Ray movies, nor does it play audio CD's. It will only run Wii U and Wii software (including titles downloaded from eShop and virtual console).

context: when is the 3d monitor released? when is the playstation 3d monitor released in the US amazon says dec 31 BUT in the E3 conference they said it was fall 2011
response: This will be out before or on September 26th, 2011. 100% sure.

context: Do we have to have an extra wireless receiver to use on PC like xbox 360 controller
response: It plugs into PC with a standard USB phone charging cable, you will have to go to Xbox.com and download the drivers. I am not aware of a way to play on PC wirelessly.

context: Which DLC's are included in this trilogy? (I want to know if I need to buy the others or not). I would like to own all of the DLC's as well.
response: PlayStation 3, Bring Down the Sky will be included both on disc and on the PSN download, Mass Effect 2 will still have the same DLC on-disc that it was originally shipped with: Cerberus Network; Genesis; Kasumi; Overlord; and Lair of the Shadow Broker. Finally, Mass Effect 3 will also be exactly as it originally shipped.

context: Are any of the physical manuals included?
response: Sadly, no. You can find digital copies in .pdf format at manuals.bethsoft.com, however.

response: It has English subtitles and Japanese audio

context: what does this do?
response: It is used with Pokémon FireRed and LeafGreen to trade/battle etc via a wireless connection. It does require proximity though. It is only compatible with the gameboy advance and those specific games.

context: Does it work on Windows XP?
response: I used xp for this, and it worked flawlessly. if you have xp, get this!

context: What are the computer specs for this game?
response: If your laptop or desktop is no longer than 5 years old, you should be able to run this game with ease. I have a HP Pavilion Elite HPE112, and it runs perfectly on it. The game's still relatively good considering it's age, cut scenes, soldier movement, music, controls on battlefield all work out smoothly. Give it a go!

response: Not this one, they made a different one for the slim I believe.

response: There is a similar Xbox One title, but the Xbox One does not support use or play Xbox 360 game disks.  It also requires a Kinect.

context: Does this work with the wii?
response: This is not meant for use with the Wii.  Only PC/Mac.  Classic Linker N64 for Nintendo Wii and Gamecube - Classic Controller Connector for Wii and GC  This is the item you want for N64 to Wii.
